roleset.name: fine-tune

example.name: calibration-n
example.text: Events of glacierized and non-glacierized calibration regions are shown in (d).

example.name: calibrated-j
example.text: Even the carefully calibrated machinery in its giant Fremont plant, to the north of the Valley, was believed to be undamaged.

roleset.note: CALIBRATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'calibrate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from calibrate.01-v predicate notes)
CALIBRATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for Cryosphere.

example.name: intercalibration-n
example.text: This work provides a relative intercalibration of the high-energy proton channels from the Energetic Particle Sensors (EPS).
example.arg: of the high-energy proton channels from the Energetic Particle Sensors (EPS).

example.text: Same comparison steps proposed here when intercalibrating CLARREO with CrIS AIRS, and/or IASI.
